description: Writing a novel has never been easier. In this writing course you will learn how to define an interesting plot, elaborate powerful characters, design meaningful settings, write delightfully and choose the best way to publish your fiction book. If you feel that you would like to start writing your own novel but you don't have the knowledge, habits or motivation to take the step, then this course is for you. Join today to start learning, writing and creating your adventure.
title: Novel Writing
